calculate.calculateExpression: isNaN(parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget)) ? undefined: (parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget))

parseInt(moriskyScore4) === 0 && parseInt(moriskyScore4) < 1 ? 'Good' : parseInt(moriskyScore4) >=1 && parseInt(moriskyScore4) <= 2 ? 'Inadequate' : parseInt(moriskyScore4) >= 3 && parseInt(moriskyScore4) <= 4 ? 'Poor' : 'Unknown'

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: Do you ever feel under pressure about sticking to your treatment plan? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: How often do you have difficulty remembering to take all your medication? (0=Never/Rarely, 1/4=Once in a while, 1/2=Sometimes, 3/4=Usually,1=All the time)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

calculate.calculateExpression: isNaN(parseFloat(difficultyRemembering) + parseFloat(underPressure) + parseFloat(symptomControl)+ parseFloat(medicineYesterday)+ parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget)) ? undefined: (parseFloat(difficultyRemembering) + parseFloat(underPressure) + parseFloat(symptomControl)+ parseFloat(medicineYesterday)+ parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget))

parseInt(moriskyScore) === 0 && parseFloat(moriskyScore) <= 0.25 ? 'Good' : parseFloat(moriskyScore) >=0.5 && parseInt(moriskyScore) <= 2 ? 'Inadequate' : parseInt(moriskyScore) >= 3 && parseInt(moriskyScore) <= 8 ? 'Poor' : 'Unknown'
